label: Alcohol-Cocktail
def: Describes an alcoholic cocktail

label: Alcohol-Free
def: No alcohol used or contained

label: Celery-Free
def: Does not contain celery or derivatives

label: Crustcean-Free
def: Does not contain crustaceans (shrimp, lobster etc.) or derivatives

label: Dairy-Free
def: No dairy; no lactose

label: DASH
def: Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension diet

label: Egg-Free
def: No eggs or products containing eggs

label: Fish-Free
def: No fish or fish derivatives

label: FODMAP-Free
def: Does not contain FODMAP foods

label: Gluten-Free
def: No ingredients containing gluten

label: Immuno-Supportive
def: Recipes which fit a science-based approach to eating to strengthen the immune system

label: Keto-Friendly
def: Maximum 7 grams of net carbs per serving

label: Kidney-Friendly
def: Per serving – phosphorus less than 250 mg AND potassium less than 500 mg AND sodium less than 500 mg

label: Kosher
def: Contains only ingredients allowed by the kosher diet. However it does not guarantee kosher preparation of the ingredients themselves

label: Low Potassium
def: Less than 150mg per serving

label: Low Sugar
def: No simple sugars – glucose, dextrose, galactose, fructose, sucrose, lactose, maltose

label: Lupine-Free
def: Does not contain lupine or derivatives

label: Mediterranean
def: Mediterranean diet

label: Mollusk-Free
def: No mollusks

label: Mustard-Free
def: Does not contain mustard or derivatives

label: No oil added
def: No oil added except to what is contained in the basic ingredients

label: Paleo
def: Excludes what are perceived to be agricultural products; grains, legumes, dairy products, potatoes, refined salt, refined sugar, and processed oils

label: Peanut-Free
def: No peanuts or products containing peanuts

label: Pescatarian
def: Does not contain meat or meat based products, can contain dairy and fish

label: Pork-Free
def: Does not contain pork or derivatives

label: Red-Meat-Free
def: Does not contain beef, lamb, pork, duck, goose, game, horse, and other types of red meat or products containing red meat.

label: Sesame-Free
def: Does not contain sesame seed or derivatives

label: Shellfish-Free
def: No shellfish or shellfish derivatives

label: Soy-Free
def: No soy or products containing soy

label: Sugar-Conscious
def: Less than 4g of sugar per serving

label: Sulfite-Free
def: No Sulfites

label: Tree-Nut-Free
def: No tree nuts or products containing tree nuts

label: Vegan
def: No meat, poultry, fish, dairy, eggs or honey

label: Vegetarian
def: No meat, poultry, or fish

label: Wheat-Free
def: No wheat, can have gluten though
